sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { @Output() selectedPage = new EventEmitter(); onSelect(pageSelected: string) { this.selectedPage.emit(pageSelected) } }
